snippet: Defending the use of finger-imaging, Mayor Bloomberg betrayed a sense of contempt for food-stamp recipients.
abstract: Jim Dwyer About New York column; Gov Andrew M Cuomo plans to end the time-consuming practice of finger-imaging everyone who applies for food stamps, saying it is an unnecessary stigma for working people who need help in hard times.
lead_paragraph: Defending the use of finger-imaging, Mayor Bloomberg betrayed a sense of contempt for food-stamp recipients.

headline.seo: Holding a Spot for Stigma in the City’s Food Stamp Lines
headline.main: Holding a Spot for Stigma in the City’s Food Stamp Lines
headline.print_headline: Holding a Spot for Stigma In the City’s Food Stamp Lines
